channel.title: Tutorial on Awesome Arabic Speakers
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Awesome Arabic Speakers

item.title: Elzero Web School
item.description: Elzero Web School is one of the most popular educational YouTube channels for web development in Arabic. The channel aims to simplify programming and web development concepts for both beginners and professionals through comprehensive courses and tutorials such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, as well as frameworks and libraries like Laravel, Vue.js, and more.
